text.section:
A franchise tax, measured by gross receipts, is imposed, for each calendar year, on each public service company:
engaged in a telephone business in the State; or
engaged in the transmission, distribution, or delivery of electricity or natural gas in the State.

The tax imposed under subsection (a) of this section does not apply to a public service company that is:
a county;
a municipal corporation; or
a nonprofit electric cooperative.
